name: Happy Days are Here Again
preparation:
Gentleman Jack features hints of banana, vanilla and caramel, making it the ideal whiskey for tiki cocktails. Peter Roccaforte takes advantage of this by adding some tropical elements to a classically constructed Whiskey Sour. The result is a cocktail that tastes fresh and familiar in the best possible way.

Combine all the ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake.

Strain into a chilled rocks glass.

Garnish with a star anise.
